trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet
Disable-JobTrigger
Disable-JobTrigger
简述

trans-unit.source: Disables the job triggers of scheduled jobs
trans-unit.target: 禁用计划作业的作业触发器
语法
说明

trans-unit.source: The **Disable-JobTrigger** cmdlet temporarily disables the job triggers of scheduled jobs.
trans-unit.target: **Disable-jobtrigger** cmdlet 可临时禁用计划作业的作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: Disabling preserves all job trigger properties, but it prevents the job trigger from starting the scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 该禁用操作会保留所有作业触发器属性，但它会阻止作业触发器启动计划作业。

trans-unit.source: To use this cmdlet, use the Get-JobTrigger cmdlet to get the job triggers.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此 cmdlet，请使用 Get-jobtrigger cmdlet 来获取作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: Then pipe the job triggers to **Disable-JobTrigger** or use its **InputObject** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 通过管道将作业触发器 **Disable-jobtrigger** 或使用其 **InputObject** 参数。

trans-unit.source: To disable a job trigger, the **Disable-JobTrigger** cmdlet sets the **Enabled** property of the job trigger to False ($false).
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用作业触发器， **Disable-jobtrigger** cmdlet 集 **已启用** 属性为 False ($false) 的作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: To re-enable the job trigger, use the Enable-JobTrigger cmdlet, which sets the **Enabled** property of the job trigger to True ($true).
trans-unit.target: 若要重新启用作业触发器，请使用 Enable-jobtrigger cmdlet，后者会设置 **已启用** 属性为 True ($true) 的作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: Disabling a job trigger does not disable the scheduled job, such as is done by the Disable-ScheduledJob cmdlet, but if you disable all job triggers, the effect is the same as disabling the scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 禁用某个作业触发器不会禁用计划的作业，如通过 Disable-scheduledjob cmdlet，但如果您禁用所有作业触发器，则效果与禁用计划的作业相同。

trans-unit.source: If you disable a scheduled job or disable all job triggers of a scheduled job, you can still start the job by using the Start-Job cmdlet or use the disabled scheduled job as a template.
trans-unit.target: 如果您禁用计划的作业，或禁用计划作业的所有作业触发器，您仍然可以通过使用 Start-job cmdlet 启动作业或禁用的计划的作业用作模板。

trans-unit.source: **Disable-ScheduledJob** is one of a collection of job scheduling cmdlets in the **PSScheduledJob** module that is included in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: **Disable-scheduledjob** 是一系列作业计划中的 cmdlet **PSScheduledJob** 包含在 Windows PowerShell 模块。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Scheduled Jobs, see the About topics in the PSScheduledJob module.
trans-unit.target: 有关计划作业的详细信息，请参阅 PSScheduledJob 模块中的“关于”主题。

trans-unit.source: Import the PSScheduledJob module and then type: `Get-Help about_Scheduled*` or see about_Scheduled_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: 导入 PSScheduledJob 模块，然后键入︰ `Get-Help about_Scheduled*` 或请参阅 about_Scheduled_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。
示例
示例 1︰ 禁用作业触发器

trans-unit.source: This command disables the first trigger (ID=1) of the Backup-Archives scheduled job on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令禁用本地计算机上 Backup-Archives 计划作业的第一个触发器（ID 为 1）。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Get-JobTrigger cmdlet to get the job trigger.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 Get-jobtrigger cmdlet 来获取作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: A pipeline operator sends the job trigger to the **Disable-JobTrigger** cmdlet, which disables it.
trans-unit.target: 管道运算符将发送到该作业触发器 **Disable-jobtrigger** cmdlet，后者，则将禁用。
示例 2︰ 禁用所有作业触发器

trans-unit.source: These commands disable all job triggers on two scheduled jobs and display the results.
trans-unit.target: 以下命令禁用两个计划作业上的所有作业触发器并显示结果。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Disable job trigger of a scheduled job on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 禁用远程计算机上计划作业的作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: This command disables the daily job triggers on the DeployPackage scheduled job on the Server01 remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令在 Server01 远程计算机上禁用 DeployPackage 计划作业中每日作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run the commands on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 在 Server01 计算机上运行命令。

trans-unit.source: The remote command uses the Get-JobTrigger cmdlet to get the job triggers of the DeployPackage scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 远程命令使用 Get-jobtrigger cmdlet 来获取 DeployPackage 计划作业的作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: A pipeline operator sends the job triggers to the Where-Object cmdlet which returns only daily job triggers.
trans-unit.target: 管道运算符将作业触发器发送到 Where-object cmdlet，后者将返回每日作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: A pipeline operator sends the daily job triggers to the **Disable-JobTrigger** cmdlets which disables them.
trans-unit.target: 管道运算符将发送到的每日作业触发器 **Disable-jobtrigger** cmdlet 其进行禁用。
参数
-InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies the job trigger to be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 指定要禁用的作业触发器。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains **ScheduledJobTrigger** objects or type a command or expression that gets **ScheduledJobTriger** objects, such as a Get-JobTrigger command.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个包含变量 **ScheduledJobTrigger** 对象，或在键入的命令或表达式来获取 **ScheduledJobTriger** 对象，如 Get-jobtrigger 命令。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe a **ScheduledJobTrigger** object to **Disable-JobTrigger**.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过管道 **ScheduledJobTrigger** 对象传递给 **Disable-jobtrigger**。
-PassThru

trans-unit.source: The **Passthru** parameter displays any objects that are created or modified by your command.
trans-unit.target: **Passthru** 参数将显示在创建或修改通过你的命令的任何对象。
-Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。
-WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。
cmdlet 未运行。
CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。
有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。
输入
Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.ScheduledJobTrigger

trans-unit.source: You can pipe job triggers to **Disable-JobTrigger**.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过管道将作业触发器 **Disable-jobtrigger**。
输出
无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。
说明

trans-unit.source: **Disable-JobTrigger** does not generate errors or warnings if you disable a job trigger that is already disabled.
trans-unit.target: **Disable-jobtrigger** 不会生成错误或警告，如果您禁用已禁用的作业触发器。
